title: Enacts the "jury service non-retribution act"
summary: Enacts the "jury service non-retribution act"; provides an employee who is absent from employment to serve as a juror the right to bring a civil action against an employer who discharges or penalizes such employee; remedies include reinstatement and payment of lost compensation; provides for a one year period of limitations for such action.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to enacting the "jury service non-retribution act"
